config.hook_desc: Línea de tiempo con los últimos n estados actualizados por los usuarios.
config.hook_extra_data: a:3:{s:7:"display";a:5:{s:6:"custom";s:12:"timeline.php";s:8:"settings";s:71:"Settings: Número de estados a cargar, Número de estados por petición";s:8:"language";s:36:"From portal_public_portal: noupdates";s:9:"templates";s:138:"From skin_portal: globalTimeline, pluginTimeline, repButtons, skeletonTemplate, statusAjax, statusIndividual, statusReplies, statusUpdates";s:3:"css";s:20:"CSS Files: timeline";}s:9:"templates";a:1:{s:11:"skin_portal";a:8:{i:0;s:14:"globalTimeline";i:1;s:14:"pluginTimeline";i:2;s:10:"repButtons";i:3;s:16:"skeletonTemplate";i:4;s:10:"statusAjax";i:5;s:16:"statusIndividual";i:6;s:13:"statusReplies";i:7;s:13:"statusUpdates";}}s:3:"css";a:1:{s:0:"";s:8:"timeline";}}

file.hooks_source: * Codebit.org * IP.Board v3.3.0 * @description * Last Updated: $Date: 09-may-2012 -006 $ * * @filename timeline.php * @author $Author: juliobarreraa@gmail.com $ * @package PRI * @subpackage * @link http://www.codebit.org * @since 09-may-2012 * @timestamp 15:52:10 * @version $Rev: $ * */ /** * Description of timeline * * @author juliobarreraa@gmail.com */ class timeline { //Private private $timeline; //Protected protected $registry; protected $memberData; protected $DB; //Public public $lang; public function __construct() { $this->registry = ipsRegistry::instance(); $this->settings = & $this->registry->fetchSettings(); //Get settings timeline_max_status $this->memberData = & $this->registry->member()->fetchMemberData(); //This member data $this->lang = $this->registry->getClass('class_localization'); //Load language $this->DB = $this->registry->DB(); //Obsolete $this->member = $this->registry->member(); } public function getOutput() { $this->lang->loadLanguageFile(array('public_profile', 'public_portal'), 'members'); $classToLoad = IPSLib::loadLibrary( IPSLib::getAppDir( 'portal' ) . '/sources/timeline.php', 'timelineClass', 'portal' ); $this->timeline = new $classToLoad(0); $pages = $this->timeline->getPager(); $rows = $this->timeline->getStatus(); return $this->registry->output->getTemplate('portal')->globalTimeline($rows, $pages); } } ?>
